@TheView @Lesdoggg Words dont disappear, & their meaning evaporate over time, esp. if people can still hear them. That's why we take responsibility for the errors we make, even years later. It's the kindness we've learned to give since in action.

@TheView @Lesdoggg you have always been mine and my daughter’s favorite!... as a matter fact, she loved you more than she loved me, and was always saying that she wished you were her mom because you were so cool.... And hearing that was sooo cool! Have a great day! (7)

@TheView @Lesdoggg But, I saw you say so on video. If I ask you about it, the best response is not, "Dont come for me; I'm funny so I get to mock your humanity". It is, "OK, I said that. It's not what I believe & I hope you can pardon me for those old jokes." Then we are both free to laugh again.

@TheView @Lesdoggg P.S. Please forgive me Whoopi for not mentioning you I totally overlooked you, but not on purpose I was so caught up in the moment....I apologize, you were my favorite And I felt you never got the recognition that you truly deserve as a comedian or as  an actress (6)

@TheView @Lesdoggg Leslie, I adore & admire your work. So pls let me explain my POV on this. Last year I stumbled on your concert on YT. from way before SNL. You had a whole routine on "Lesbians are icky", mocking lesbians. I know you do not believe lesbians are icky now. I know. But, ... +
@TheView @Lesdoggg find something to do with your lives besides bitch all the time it’s totally annoying, find something to do that can remind you what it’s like to live, what is like to be free! (5)

@TheView @Lesdoggg not to hurt someone’s feelings, stop being so damn offended! If you see something on TV, and you don’t like it, change the channel... stop bitching about it, take your dog for a walk in the park, go play ball with your kids or plant a garden, a tree, something, anything...(4)

@TheView @Lesdoggg of our world to laugh at, and we did laugh because we needed  it then, and we need it now. Everyone should stop being so damn offended and start living their lives without telling other people how to live their’s....I’m so sick and tired of everyone being so damn careful (3)
